Accountant Job at ASM Advisory Partners




        
    

        
        ASM Advisory Partners - Our client, an esteemed international school in Lekki, is recruiting suitably qualified candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Accountant

Job Location: Lekki, Lagos
Job type: Full-time

Job Description
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are looking for a School Accountant who has technical expertise and a passion for education, ensuring our finances operate as smoothly as our classrooms.
	If you have strong accounting and payroll skills, IT proficiency, and modern software experience—and ideally have worked in a school environment—this could be your next big opportunity.


Why You’ll Appreciate This Role
You will operate in a cooperative and encouraging environment where:


	Accuracy & integrity are valued as much as innovation.
	You’re empowered with 21st-century digital tools to make your work efficient and impactful.
	Your expertise directly supports a school that is shaping future leaders.


Key Responsibilities


	Maintain precise financial records in line with policies and standards.
	Prepare monthly, quarterly, and annual reports.
	Oversee payroll processing and ensure timely payments.
	Manage accounts payable and receivable, including reconciliation duties.
	Use accounting software and digital tools to improve efficiency. Assist with budgeting, forecasting, and financial planning.
	Liaise with auditors, vendors, and regulators to ensure compliance.


What We’re Looking For


	Degree in Accounting, Finance or a related field.
	Over 5 years of accounting experience, including a minimum of 2 years in a school Setting.
	ICAN/ACCA certification (desirable).
	Proficient in IT and software applications (QuickBooks, Sage, etc.).
	Excellent organisational, analytical, and communication skills.


What We Offer


	Competitive Salary: Attractive compensation package aligned with experience, reviewed annually.
	Comprehensive Benefits: Health insurance coverage and additional staff perks to support your well-being.
	Professional Growth: Continuous professional development opportunities (workshops, tech conferences, certifications). We invest in our teachers’ growth.
	Creative Environment: Work in a progressive school community equipped with modern ICT facilities. Collaborate with enthusiastic colleagues who appreciate innovation and teamwork.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter emphasising their accounting expertise and digital skills to: hr@asmadvisorypartners.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.
